channel.title: Vote command
channel.description: Does anybody no a command code that redirects all of you players to a website. I want to use it for getting ppl to vote.

item.title: Vote command
item.description:
@308507631 wrote:

Try this:
if (playerCommand.startsWith("vote")){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("YOUR VOTING WEBSITE LINK", 12000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting for SERVER NAME! type ::claim after voting."); }

[size=14pt]OR[/size]

Try this:

if (playerCommand.equals("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("SERVER NAME", 12000); c.sendMessage("Please vote every day for us!"); }
However, if you’re hosting your server on RSWebclients you’ll have to i guess code you ::vote or ::vote4cash command in, since RSWebclients is client/server sided.

-Remember to replace your vote link and server name in the following codes i’ve given you!!!

This would be the command to direct all of your players to the vote page:

if (playerCommand.equals("allvote") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("http://www.rswebclients.com/vote/Evolution-X", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("YOU CAN CHANGE THIS LINK TO A REGISTER PAGE LINK", 12000); } }

The code above can be a command that directs people to the register page on your forum and the vote page simultaneously.
Then again, you’ll have to code it in if you’re on a site like RSW that has their server’s sided, or if people are playing a downloadable client, it’ll work then.

Read full topic
